mapper.select: select qna_id, members_id, qna_title, qna_content, file_img, user_name, birthdate, tel, email, reg_date, answer_check, answer_content, answer_date from qna where qna_id=#{qna_id};

select qna_id, members_id, qna_title, qna_content, file_img, user_name, birthdate, tel, email, reg_date, answer_check, answer_content, answer_date from qna
qna_id like concat('%', #{qna_id}, '%')
order by qna_id desc

select qna_id, members_id, qna_title, qna_content, file_img, user_name, birthdate, tel, email, cast(reg_date as date) as reg_date, answer_check, answer_content, answer_date from qna
qna_id like concat('%', #{qna_id}, '%')
order by qna_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into qna (qna_title, qna_content, file_img, user_name, birthdate, tel, email, reg_date, answer_check) values (#{qna_title}, #{qna_content}, #{file_img}, #{user_name}, #{birthdate}, #{tel}, #{email}, now(), '미답변');
mapper.update: update qna set answer_check = '답변완료', answer_content = #{answer_content}, answer_date = now() where qna_id=#{qna_id};
mapper.select:
select count(*) from qna
user_name like concat ('%', #{user_name}, '%')
or answer_check like concat ('%', #{answer_check}, '%')
